errors.error_description: The README states that the supported Python version is `>= 3.6`, but the correct minimum version is `3.8`. Using an older version like 3.6 or 3.7 will lead to compatibility issues.
correction_candidates: Tortoise ORM is supported on CPython >= 3.8
Tortoise ORM is supported on Python >= 3.7
Tortoise ORM is supported on CPython >= 3.7 for SQLite, and CPython >= 3.8 for other databases.
Tortoise ORM is supported on any Python version with asyncio support.
errors.golden_answer: Tortoise ORM is supported on CPython >= 3.8
